    Color :: [4]u8

    Quad ¶
    Source

    Quad :: struct #packed {
	tl: Vertex,
	tr: Vertex,
	br: Vertex,
	bl: Vertex,
}

    Vertex ¶
    Source

    Vertex :: struct {
	v: [3]f32,
	c: [4]u8,
}

	advance: u8,

	v_seg:   u8,

    draw_segs_quad_buffer ¶
    Source

    draw_segs_quad_buffer :: proc(
	x, y:         f32, 
	segs:         []u8, 
	vertical:     bool, 
	c:            [4]u8, 
	buf:          []Quad, 
	start_offset: int, 
	scale:        f32 = f32(1.0), 
) -> (quads: int) {…}
     

    Same memory layout, but takes a []quad instead of []byte

    draw_segs_vertex_buffer ¶

	vertical:     bool, 
	c:            [4]u8, 
	vbuf:         []u8, 
	start_offset: int, 
	scale:        f32 = f32(1.0), 
) -> (offset: int) {…}
     

    Compatible with original C API

	quad_buffer: []Quad, 
	scale:       f32 = f32(1.0), 
) -> (quads: int) {…}
     

    Same memory layout, but takes a []quad instead of []byte
